document.heading: "Pepco Cost-Sharing Fund for DC PLUG Establishment Temporary Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-178, the “"Pepco Cost-Sharing Fund for DC PLUG Establishment Temporary Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-995. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 18, 2014, and December 2, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 23, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-537 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-178 became effective March 7, 2015.
